title: British Pop Star Donates Alamo Artifacts
teaser: Phil Collins got hooked on the 1835 battle as a kid in the 1950's watching Davy Crockett on TV. Crockett was among the 200 Americans who defended the Alamo against 1,500 Mexican troops.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
